entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm over northern sections. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
